1.title: StepStitches
1.subtitle: Welcome to StepStitches where you can find unique keepsakes sure to delight. Each item is handmade with love and exquisite care. Both ready to ship and custom made items are available.

products.name: Black Rag Doll - Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Annie® is a delightful vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Ann style doll is dressed in a pretty floral navy and yellow dress with matching hair bow. Doll dress and hair bow are removable.

products.name: Raggedy Andy Doll - Boy Doll
products.description: Cinnamon Andrew is a fun vintage style doll with a modern twist. This Raggedy Andy style doll is dressed in light blue overalls with a white shirt and dark blue bow tie. Doll clothes are removable.

products.name: Personalized Raggedy Ann Doll
products.description: If you would like a name embroidered on the doll's dress, please choose that option AND write the name or phrase in the Note to Seller box during check-out.  She is Made to Order and will take approximately two weeks to complete before shipping.

1.title: Toni Morrison - Biography
1.subtitle: Toni Morrison was a Nobel and Pulitzer Prize-winning American novelist. Among her best-known novels are "The Bluest Eye," "Song of Solomon," "Beloved," and "A Mercy."

2.title: Amazing Essence
2.subtitle: Amazing Essence is a Philadelphia based, one-woman small business built on a dream of entrepreneurship. Our handcrafted products are created using 100% soy wax without additives, natural (lead-free) cotton wick and high quality fragrance oils without phthalates or additives.

products.name: 25 oz. Triple Wick Candle Bowl
products.description: The Amazing Essence 25 oz. candle bowls are handcrafted using natural soy wax, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office.

products.name: 4oz. Linen Spray
products.description: Mist our handcrafted linen sprays into the air liberally to Relax, Balance or Uplift your senses. When misting Linen, Spray 7 inches away and only on washable fabric. Contains essential oils/highly quality fragrance oils.

products.name: 8oz. Herbal Candles
products.description: The Amazing Essence 8 oz. herbal candles are handcrafted using natural soy wax, and fused with dried herbs, high quality fragrance oils without phthalates and a natural cotton wick to ensure a clean, toxic-free burn in your home or office. Approx 40hr of burn time.

2.title: It’s Nola
2.subtitle: Reimagined healthy granola snack bites rolled into a ball for easy snacking pleasure. Bold flavor to match our bold Brooklyn lifestyle.

3.title: BLK & Proud Forever
3.subtitle: BLK & Proud Forever was started in 2019 for a family that was in need of some custom apparel that could display their Black pride. Our goal is to provide some great BLK&Proud gear that supports, celebrates and amplifies the dopeness in being Blackity Black Black 365.

3.title: African-American Heroism in the Military
3.subtitle: Dating all the way back to the American Revolution, African-Americans have played key roles in the history (and success) of the U.S. military. Profiled below are some notable African-Americans and their achievements, as well as milestones in the integration of African-Americans in the U.S. military.

4.title: Brown v. Board: Timeline of School Integration in the U.S.
4.subtitle: Trace school integration from 1849 to 2007.

4.title: 15th Amendment
4.subtitle: The 15th Amendment granting African-American men the right to vote was adopted into the U.S. Constitution in 1870.

5.title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
5.subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

products.name: D Is For Dragon Fruit (Hardcover)
products.description: D is for Dragon Fruit is a vibrantly illustrated, exotic fruit alphabet book that exposes children to a variety of nutritious fruits, reinforces the alphabet and expands a child’s knowledge of the world.

products.name: When Mama Braids My Hair (Hardcover)
products.description: When Mama Braids My Hair captures a young girl’s experience of having her hair braided and the bond it creates with her mother. The tradition of African hair braiding is more than just a Sunday routine. Come join Nikki on an adventure as she is transformed into an Egyptian queen, a Nigerian goddess, a Zulu warrior, and a Maasai girl.

products.name: Elephants Don't Have Stripes! (COMING SOON!)
products.description: Elephants Don’t Have Stripes! Deep in the valley, in the dry grasslands of the African savanna, a young elephant admires other animals for their beauty. He yearns to look and act more like them. One by one, each wish comes true and the young elephant couldn’t be happier.

5.title: Kintu New York
5.subtitle: Kintu handbags are designed in New York, co-developed with global artisans, and made in Italy. The Kintu brand appeals to the dynamic, busy, urban woman who values quality and self-expression.

6.title: Corner 103
6.subtitle: Corner 103 has a reputation for making world class wines, and is committed to exceeding expectations.

products.name: NV Sparkling Rosé
products.description: This Gold Medal winning wine was made in the classic French style using traditional grapes; making it non-vintage; and using the methode champenoise process which requires a secondary fermentation in the bottle.

products.name: 2018 Chardonnay, Sonoma Carneros
products.description: Our 2018 Chardonnay was crafted from a low-yielding vineyard in the Carneros AVA that consistently produces some of the region's best Chardonnay grapes.

products.name: 2017 Grenache, Alexander Valley
products.description: Our 2017 Grenache is a balanced wine crafted from an amazing low yielding vineyard in the Alexander Valley that consistently delivers excellent fruit flavors and silky tannins.

6.title: Reconstruction in America
6.subtitle: Read the Equal Justice Initiative's report on racial violence after the Civil War, from 1865-1876.

7.title: Change.org: Justice for Daunte Wright
7.subtitle: 20 year old man Daunte Wright, a father to a two year old, was murdered by Minneapolis-area police. Help get him and his family justice by signing this petition.

7.title: How to Be an Antiracist
7.subtitle: Ibram X. Kendi's concept of antiracism reenergizes and reshapes the conversation about racial justice in America—but even more fundamentally, points us toward liberating new ways of thinking about ourselves and each other.

8.title: Harvard student penned textbook on racial literacy
8.subtitle: Winona Guo '22 co-authored a book on race, culture, and identity as a resource for teachers.

8.title: Four-year Analysis: Police-related deaths across racial groups
8.subtitle: A four-year research study released on June 24th, 2020 shows that Black Americans were, on average, more than three times as likely as White Americans to be killed during a police encounter.

9.title: Gentleman AF
9.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

9.title: Fewer Cards
9.subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

10.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
10.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Classic Boss Lady Track Suit
products.description: Chic track suit for the lady on the go. Throw it on for a quick trip to the grocery store, a nail appointment, or dress it up for a cute brunch look.

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

10.title: The Sentencing Project
10.subtitle: The Sentencing Project promotes effective and humane responses to crime that minimize imprisonment and criminalization of youth and adults by promoting racial, ethnic, economic, and gender justice.

11.title: Derek Chauvin sentencing
11.subtitle: A Hennepin County jury found Derek Chauvin guilty on all three counts against him on Tuesday, April 20, 2021, setting the stage for the sentencing of the former Minneapolis officer. Here's what we know about when sentencing will happen and what to expect.

11.title: Know Your Rights Camp
11.subtitle: Colin Kaepernick's organization's mission is to advance the liberation and well-being of Black and Brown communities through education, self-empowerment, mass-mobilization and the creation of new systems that elevate the next generation of change leaders.

12.title: A.O. Hamer
12.subtitle:
Hey, I'm Aramis and I love color!

My acrylic paintings are inspired by divine femininity, music, higher consciousness, and the cosmos. Liberation is my life's work- to free myself from the chains that could hold me back mentally, physically, and spiritually. My paintbrush reminds me of the creative power I have within the canvas - and life. As I take this journey to freedom, I hope to inspire others along the way.

12.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
12.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

13.title: The Green Laundress
13.subtitle: The Green Laundress offers the best laundry products at the lowest prices online.

products.name: Tub Scrub
products.description: Our Tub Scrub will have your tub as well as your whole bathroom sparkling and smelling fresh and clean! 1-2 heaping spoonfuls with a little water is all you need!

products.name: Laundry Soap
products.description: Our 24 ounce bag of Laundry Soap will have your clothes smelling fresh without any lingering artificial fragrances like commercial detergent. Great for those with sensitive skin!

products.name: Multi-Purpose Spray
products.description: There's no mystery in the name! Our 16 ounce Multi Purpose Spray can be used to clean just about anything.

13.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
13.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

14.title: The Hate U Give
14.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

14.title: Savor Seasoning Blends
14.subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

products.name: Rubbed: Honey, It's BBQ
products.description: A honey based rub for your ribs, ham salmon. The honey base will give your meats a nice crispy, caramel crust.

products.name: Truffle Butter
products.description: Sweet cream butter, blended with Italian black truffles and truffle salt. Your potatoes, beef, pork, veggies, sourdough bread, pasta, seafood, rice and your tummy will thank you!

products.name: Vampire Salt (6oz Grinder)
products.description: A blend of garlic cloves and sea salt. It's just that simple. Try it on everything; soups, sauces, poultry, pork, beef, mashed potatoes, veggies.

15.title: Netflix Explained: Racial Wealth Gap
15.subtitle: Cory Booker and others discuss how slavery, housing discrimination and centuries of inequality have compounded to create a racial wealth gap.

15.title: How to deconstruct racism, one headline at a time
15.subtitle: Baratunde Thurston explores the phenomenon of white Americans calling the police on black Americans who have committed the crimes of ... eating, walking or generally "living while black." In this profound, thought-provoking and often hilarious talk, he reveals the power of language to change stories of trauma into stories of healing — while challenging us all to level up.

16.title: Cuff
16.subtitle: A platform for creating mature conversations through discussions of love and dating experiences.

16.title: CarmaBella Skincare
16.subtitle: CarmaBella Skincare is made for women who want the best skincare, without any artificial chemicals or unnecessary ingredients. When using our products, you don't have to choose between natural and luxurious.

products.name: Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask
products.description: Want an instant glow? We have the perfect natural skincare product to help you achieve it. The Brightening Turmeric Clay Mask instantly brightens dull, tired skin and restores your skins healthy complexion over time.

products.name: HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel
products.description: The HydroSurge Moisturizing Gel replenishes water and helps to improve your skin's moisture barrier, resulting in smooth, hydrated skin. This addictively refreshing gel leaves skin plump, dewy, and glowing.

products.name: The Essential Bath & Body Set
products.description: The Essential Bath & Body Set is a nourishing collection that will leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized all day. This set includes the Natural Sugar Based Body Wash, a bath puff, and the Nourishing Shea Body Lotion.

17.title: Beyond the Numbers: The Experiential Effects of Stereotype Threat on Students of Color at TCU
17.subtitle: This study aims to examine if and how the effects of negative stereotypes of students of color are felt beyond the statistical measures of academic success, reaching into the classroom and social experiences of these students.

17.title: Bailee's Nail Box
17.subtitle: Bailee's Nail Box is a FUN box for girls, created by 11 year old Bailee K. for girls ages 4 - 12 who love all things nails! Bailee's goal was to create memorable boxes filled with different tools for fun nail designs with an extra girly accessory with each box.

products.name: Bailee's Bundle
products.description: Two safe non-toxic polishes - Bailee's Spark & Rose Shimmer. Nail polish ring holder. All natural hand scrub, made by Bailee, that will leave your hands smooth, moisturized and exfoliated.

products.name: Christmas Scrunchie
products.description: We have a variety of different colored Christmas scrunchies! Let us send you one!

products.name: My Beauty Secret is Gratitude
products.description: You've now found the staple t-shirt of your wardrobe. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. And the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite!

18.title: Jungalow
18.subtitle: Black-owned home decor store selling furniture, bed and bath products, planters, and more.

products.name: Tigress Tangerine Rug by Justina Blakeney® X Loloi
products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

products.name: Mary Jane Hook Pillow by Justina Blakeney
products.description: We love the bold contrasting colors of the teal leaf motif against the fresh peachy-orange. The square shape is easy to toss anywhere – a 'chill out chair', a cozy pillow pit on the floor... anywhere you imagine. Hint: This pillows makes for a rad gift for your mellow homies!

products.name: Peace Vase by Justina Blakeney®
products.description: Bold and colorful vessels with personality are kind of our thing here at Jungalow. These Peace Vases will add just the right amount of charm to your #shelfie. Fill with dried foraged flowers or fronds and display it as a sculptural focal point on your entryway table or mantle.

18.title: Donating Tip
18.subtitle: Maximize your impact by making smaller, monthly donations to a few different organizations.
18.info: Don't just let your donations be a one-time lump sum donation. Instead, spread the love out with smaller, recurring, monthly donations to continue supporting the movement beyond your first donation.

19.title: Brown Toy Box
19.subtitle: Our mission is to normalize Black excellence and create prosperous career pathways for Black children through STEAM education, cultural representation and educational play.

19.title: What Is Juneteenth?
19.subtitle: Juneteenth (short for “June Nineteenth”) marks the day when federal troops arrived in Galveston, Texas in 1865 to take control of the state and ensure that all enslaved people be freed. The troops’ arrival came a full two and a half years after the signing of the Emancipation Proclamation. Juneteenth honors the end to slavery in the United States and is considered the longest-running African American holiday.

20.title: D'Lashes
20.subtitle: Take your eyelashes from thin unnoticeable eyelashes to rich, full, beautiful ones. Dionne’s Lashes are custom individual eyelash extensions that are attached to your natural eyelashes, lasting up to 6-8 weeks.

products.name: D'Ultra Matte Lipstick
products.description: You want Luxurious, creamy lipstick with a modern matte finish? Well, this Matte Lipstick Delivers saturated color, intense hydration and extended wear, for soft, smooth, beautiful lips. Just enough "Pop" to go with your D'Lashes!

products.name: D'Luscious
products.description: Be bold and rock a standout look with a little help from the D’Luscious lashes. These dark strip lashes open and enhance your eyes by creating a fuller, thicker lash look.

products.name: Black Luxury Edition Candle
products.description: This New D'Lashes Black Luxury Candle is the convergence of artistic souls who share a singular desire to create. Free of constraint and compromise. Fusing years of experience in the world of Beauty and Eyelashes.

20.title: Princess Planet
20.subtitle: Princess Planet is a brand of children's entertainment that helps promote characters with diverse hair textures, skin tones, and cultural backgrounds.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 1
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume One is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 2
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume Two is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun.

products.name: Princess Planet: Coloring book
products.description: The Princess Planet Coloring Book showcases sixteen unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

21.title: Be A Good Person
21.subtitle: Instead of supporting the current trends of negativity, our #1 goal is to remind us all to approach our days with an optimistic, positive, and refreshed outlook. We believe that positive change truly starts with within ourselves, one person at a time.

products.name: Black Color Spectrum Shirt
products.description: Fashion fit, soft feel. Water based ink screen print. BAGP hem tag. Straight cut bottom

products.name: Reflective Core Bodysuit
products.description: One Piece bodysuit but versatile enough to be utilized as a swimsuit.

products.name: Cardinal Snapback Hat
products.description: Cardinal Snapback BE A GOOD PERSON Hat

22.title: The Case for Reparations
22.subtitle: Two hundred fifty years of slavery. Ninety years of Jim Crow. Sixty years of separate but equal. Thirty-five years of racist housing policy. Until we reckon with our compounding moral debts, America will never be whole.

22.title: How we're honoring people overlooked by history
22.subtitle: Since its founding in 1851, the "New York Times" has published thousands of obituaries — for heads of state, famous celebrities, even the inventor of the sock puppet. But only a small percentage of them chronicle the lives of women and people of color. In this insightful talk, "Times" editor Amy Padnani shares the story behind "Overlooked," the project she's leading to recognize people from history whose deaths were ignored — and refocus society's lens on who is considered important.

23.title: Did you really just say that?
23.subtitle: Here's advice on how to confront microaggressions, whether you're a target, bystander or perpetrator

23.title: John Hope - Biography
23.subtitle: John Hope was an important African American educator and race leader of the early twentieth century. In 1906 he became the first Black president of Morehouse College—the alma mater of Martin Luther King Jr.—in Atlanta.

24.title: YTPshop - African Clothing
24.subtitle: All YTPshop products are crafted by women in Nigeria and the fabrics are carefully sourced from West African markets. YTPshop products are made with high-quality material, cutting edge tailoring, vibrant colors, and are affordably priced.

24.title: I Wear African
24.subtitle: I Wear African is a campaign initiative created to promote and celebrate the contemporary African lifestyle by bringing the best quality Afrocentric brands to our fans.

products.name: Hector Rectangular Indoor Lumbar Pillow
products.description: Artfully inspiring and beautiful, the Lumbar Pillow bolsters your home instantly and effortlessly while evoking bohemian style. Made in the USA, the classic rectangular silhouette of the pillow is filled with a feather down insert and is covered with a quality linen blend fabric.

products.name: African Print Dashiki T-Shirt White
products.description: The D’iyanu white dashiki t-shirt is perfect for those hot summer days! Stay cool and look great with this dashiki t-shirt which features an ultra soft feel and unique center front and sleeve details. This will become an instant favorite in your closet, and one of your most worn shirts in the hot summer!

products.name: Women African Print Yellow Long Puff Sleeve Dress
products.description: Handmade, 100% cotton, Afronista dress. Available in sizes 2-14.

25.title: Reopen Sandra Bland's Case
25.subtitle: Sandra Bland was arrested for a traffic stop on July 10, 2015 by Brian Encinia.  She was found dead in her cell three days later. Encinia was never indicted, in spite of the fact, that he physically assaulted her her on camera. There is a new video that has come to light, which may have been hidden from the grand jury.

25.title: Oh-Mazing!
25.subtitle: Yes, we sell granola (it's quite tasty), but more importantly, we want to inspire you to live your life with purpose, passion, and to follow your dreams. Our products are here to bring the adventure back to snacking, and better yet, celebrate YOU when those dreams are achieved.

products.name: Original Recipe
products.description: The Original Recipe blend has a sweet caramel flavor that makes it simply delicious. There are so many ways to enjoy this treat--topping on your yogurt, adding some crunch to your favorite ice cream, or creating a crust for a cheesecake.

products.name: Lemon Bar
products.description: Lemon Bar will please the palate of all lemon lovers and add a refreshing flavor to a bowl of oatmeal or a new bite to your favorite cheesecake recipe.

products.name: Caribbean Delight
products.description: Caribbean Delight is our first vegan product. The ingredients include coconut oil, grated coconut, and a touch of raisins that will make your palate dance. Not to mention, you will immediately be reminded of that time you went on an island vacation.

26.title: Tell Congress to Support the MORE Act (H.R. 3884/S. 2227)
26.subtitle: We believe in cannabis legalization, but only if it’s got justice baked right in. Even with more and more states saying yes to legal cannabis, hundreds of thousands of people are still being arrested every year, most of them for possession—and they are disproportionately Black. It doesn’t have to be that way. With your help we can legalize cannabis while expunging prior cannabis convictions, and make 4/20 a day we all can celebrate.

26.title: Classify White Supremacist Groups as Domestic Terrorist Organizations
26.subtitle: Request a new legal requirement to register, classify, and subsequently surveil white supremacist organizations as domestic terrorist organizations. By classifying these groups as intimidating to the American population and dangerous to human life, the institutions responsible for protecting citizens against such groups will have the necessary information and resources to prevent further destruction carried out by these violent terrorist groups.

27.title: Ava DuVernay's "13th"
27.subtitle: In this thought-provoking documentary, scholars, activists and politicians analyze the criminalization of African Americans and the U.S. prison boom.

27.title: Support the Milwaukee Freedom Fund
27.subtitle: The Milwaukee Freedom Fund is extending support to protestors in Kenosha, WI. Their mission is to build on ongoing bail abolition efforts, support immigration efforts, work towards Black and Brown Liberation, and support Black and Brown young people as they build a new world.

28.title: Official Black Wall Street
28.subtitle: Get thousands of Black-owned businesses at your fingertips with the largest online platform for Black businesses.

28.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
28.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

29.title: Vera Institute of Justice
29.subtitle: Vera is powered by hundreds of advocates, researchers, and activists working to transform the criminal legal and immigration systems until they’re fair for all. Founded in 1961 to advocate for alternatives to money bail in New York City, Vera is now a national organization that partners with impacted communities and government leaders for change.

29.title: Justice for Lakeith Smith
29.subtitle: Lakeith Smith, now 20, was charged with the murder of his friend, A’Donte Washington when he was only 15— a crime he did not commit. A'donte died at the hands of a policeman, after the police fired 4 rounds into him - and he currently walks free.

30.title: Does racism affect how you vote?
30.subtitle: Nate Silver has data that answers big questions about race in politics. For instance, in the 2008 presidential race, did Obama's skin color actually keep him from getting votes in some parts of the country? Stats and myths collide in this fascinating talk that ends with a remarkable insight.

30.title: Juneteenth is a federal holiday. What comes next?
30.subtitle: As President Biden signed the Juneteenth National Independence Day Act into law, he acknowledged a current struggle for voting rights.

31.title: Register to Vote
31.subtitle: Register to vote to make your voice heard and make sure the people we elect to positions of power have the best interests of every American in mind.

31.title: Naja Tea
31.subtitle: At Naja Tea, we stand for quality, integrity, and curiosity. We strive daily to maintain high standards in every aspect of our business. Our mission is to provide a positive, significant, and sensational experience with Naja Tea.

products.name: English Breakfast Tea
products.description: This is a full-bodied, robust, rich and blended to go well with milk and sugar and will give you an energy boost while boosting your immune system.

products.name: Brew-In-Cup with Stainless Infuser & Lid
products.description: A simple design to enjoy loose leaf tea by the cup. Lucidity Brew-in-Cup is a wonderful addition to home and office.

products.name: Biscotti Bites
products.description: A traditional Biscotti recipe modernized using organic, wholesome ingredients and served in smaller, melt-in-your-mouth, bite-sized pieces.
